text: Then a great sign appeared in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, and with the moon under her feet, and on her head was a crown of twelve stars.

She<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1064" class="">pregnant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="2896" class="">screaming</st> in <st data-num="5605">labor pains</st>, <st data-num="928" class="">struggling</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="5088">give birth</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven:</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">huge</st> <st data-num="4450" class="">red</st> <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st> that <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2768" class="">horns</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> were <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="1238">diadem crowns</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="846" class="">dragon’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3769" class="">tail</st> <st data-num="4651">swept away</st> a <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="792" class="">stars</st> in <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">hurled</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> who was <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="5088" class="">give birth</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he might <st data-num="2719" class="">devour</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">child</st> <st data-num="3752">as soon as</st> it was <st data-num="5088" class="">born</st>.
So the woman gave birth to a son, a male child, who is going to rule over all the nations with an iron rod. Her child was suddenly caught up to God and to his throne,
and she fled into the wilderness where a place had been prepared for her by God, so she could be taken care of for 1,260 days.
Then war broke out in heaven: Michael and his angels fought against the dragon, and the dragon and his angels fought back.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> the dragon was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">strong</st> enough to prevail,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3761">so</st> there <st data-num="2480" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3761">no</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">longer</st> any <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">left</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> for <st data-num="846">him and his angels</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="3173" class="">huge</st> <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st>—the <st data-num="744" class="">ancient</st> <st data-num="3789" class="">serpent</st>, the one <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>, who <st data-num="4105" class="">deceives</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3625" class="">world</st>—was <st data-num="906">thrown down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="3326">along with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

Then I heard a loud voice in heaven saying,

“The salvation and the power

and the kingdom of our God,

and the ruling authority of his Christ, have now come,

because the accuser of our brothers and sisters,

the one who accuses them day and night before our God,

has been thrown down.

But they overcame him

by the blood of the Lamb

and by the word of their testimony,

and they did not love their lives so much that they were afraid to die.

Therefore you heavens rejoice, and all who reside in them!

But woe to the earth and the sea

because the devil has come down to you!

He is filled with terrible anger,

for he knows that he only has a little time!”
Now when the dragon realized that he had been thrown down to the earth, he pursued the woman who had given birth to the male child.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4420" class="">wings</st> of a <st data-num="3173" class="">giant</st> <st data-num="105" class="">eagle</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> she could <st data-num="4072" class="">fly</st> out <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> God<n id="3" /> prepared for <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> she is <st data-num="5142">taken care of</st>—away <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">presence</st> of the <st data-num="3789" class="">serpent</st>—for a <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>, <st data-num="2540" class="">times</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2255" class="">half</st> a <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3789" class="">serpent</st> <st data-num="906" class="">spouted</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4215" class="">river</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> in an <st data-num="4160" class="">attempt</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4216" class="">sweep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="4216" class="">away by a flood</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="997" class="">came to</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">her</st> <st data-num="997" class="">rescue;</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="455">opened up</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="2666" class="">swallowed</st> the <st data-num="4215" class="">river</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st> had <st data-num="906" class="">spewed</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st> became <st data-num="3710" class="">enraged</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="565">went away</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">war</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">children</st>,<n id="2" /> those who <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">hold</st> to<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> about <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="5" />  (12:18) <st data-num="2532">And</st> the dragon<n id="6" /> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st><n id="7" /> on the <st data-num="285" class="">sand</st><n id="8" /> of the <st data-num="2281">seashore</st>.<n id="9" />
